# General Plugin Info do not edit

base   recaptcha2
author Martin Gross
email  martin@pc-coholic.de
date   2017-12-05
name   recaptcha2
desc   Add the new, simplified Recaptcha2 ("I am not a robot"-checkbox) to your register and edit-forms. Based on the recaptcha-plugin by Adrian Schlegel
url    https://www.dokuwiki.org/plugin:recaptcha2
